inkball

Class Hole

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.GameObject
      • inkball.Tile
        • inkball.Hole

  • public class Hole
extends Tile
    Represents a hole in the InkBall game. Balls can be attracted to holes and potentially captured.

        Constructs a new Hole object.
